text: Laurent-Désiré Kabila (November 27, 1927 – January 16, 2001), or simply Laurent Kabila (US: ), was a Congolese revolutionary and politician. He was the third President of the Democratic Republic of the Congo from May 17, 1997, when he overthrew Mobutu Sese Seko. == Death == On January 16, 2001, Kabila was shot and killed by one of his bodyguards. He was 73 years old. He was replaced as president eight days later by his son Joseph. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Assassinated people Category:Presidents of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:National presidents assassinated in the 21st century
title: Laurent-Désiré Kabila
